PyChannel - The pure python imageboard¶

PyChannel is a python implementation of a generic imageboard software.

Setup PyChannel¶

Installing PyChannel is incredibly easy. Just download the package and untar it or clone it from github. Then cd into the directory that you put PyChannel into and run python setup.py install to install the module.

Once the install is done running run ./pychannel-serve from the root of the PyChannel directory. Thats it PyChannel should be running on port 80!

Note

You can supply a port to the ./pychannel-serve command to serve on a different port.
